message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth significantly more than its actual market value. Given its unique features and high quality, I am confident it will greatly benefit you. I am offering this exceptional item to you for a special introductory price of $15000. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've placed on this product, $15000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. I'm happy to pay a fair price, and I'm willing to offer $10000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's market value. Let me know if you're willing to negotiate at this price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway. To further accommodate your budget while maintaining fair value for our product, I am proposing an adjusted price of $13000. This still reflects the premium nature of the product, but allows for a more flexible transaction. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $13000 is still a little higher than what I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $11500 for the product. This offer is very close to my limit, so I hope you can consider it. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.

Thank you for your prompt reply, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial solution. In light of your latest offer, I am willing to consider $12000 as a fair price for the product. This still maintains a reasonable profit margin for us while being within your budget constraints. I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and looks forward to your feedback.
